entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 07:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: SSW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain mixed with snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm except 10 mm along the southern shore. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
